name: Lyteshot
tag_list: gaming, mobile-gaming, social-gaming, peripheral, geo-based, geo-social, geo-fencing, sensor-based-gaming, platform, cloud-gaming, in-game-advertising, mobile-app
overview:
LyteShot is a social mobile gaming platform that is a sensor based peripheral system.

Utilizing the Lyter & LyteStrip sensor based peripheral system (patent pending), the LyteShot platform provides social mobile games which combine physical participation with location based gaming to allow live action role playing gaming with other players in their physical and virtual environments.

LyteShot is developing new kinds of mental and physical interactive location-based games with a compelling story line. The LyteShot platform captures and stores score and playing history while providing connectivity to other players/ leagues through the use of the interactive mobile apps that allow the gaming platform to be played anywhere.

milestones.description: LyteShot was named as one of the 25 finalists for the Chicago TechStars incubator program (formerly Excelerate labs) out of 900 teams that submitted from around the world.
